name.value: Where did this content come from

description.value: This text is intended to act as a citation to work done elsewhere that is not part of the current stewarding process where the referenced source is in some way a basis of the current value set definition.

short.value: Where did this content come from

formal.value: This text is intended to act as a citation to work done elsewhere that is not part of the current stewarding process where the referenced source is in some way a basis of the current value set definition.

comments.value: This is not intended to be a direct link to another value set. It is only intended to support a link or textual description that indicates related material for the value set.
